title: "Spiritual Development through Sexual Energy"
first_phrase: In the previous section of this text, the author discussed the importance of balance in personal and social life between different principles. In the last 200 tokens, the focus shifts towards understanding sexuality as an expression of energy polarity. The author describes an exercise taught by their master that involves feeling complementary sensations on both sides of the body, resulting in a central sensation of power that represents the unity of energy. The author also talks about the orgasm as a moment of overcoming the ego and the symbolism of the horizontal and vertical planes as an encounter between masculine and feminine principles. The use of the caduceus symbol to represent this unity of energy is explored.
content: Analogamente nell’uomo la sessualità può essere un modo di sviluppare l’energia risultante dal differenziale tra i due poli fino ad arrivare a coscienza del potenziale unitario. 225 Ci sono momenti in cui è invece possibile sorprendere la forza di vita. L’orgasmo è uno di quei momenti e rappresenta un momento di superamento dell’ego ed è più caratteristico come uso della “via secca”226. Nell’atto sessuale è il sistema nervoso autonomo, la parte vegetativa e vitale dell’uomo che manifesta sé stessa in maniera indipendente dalla volontà conscia. last_phrase: In conclusion, embracing sexuality can unlock the energy resulting from the duality of the male and female principle, resulting in a state of pure life force. By reaching this state of transcendence through intimacy, one can dissolve the sense of separation and attain unity with the world. Breaking the ego is integral in achieving this level of consciousness, and with it comes the possibility of transformation and a new sense of self.
